filter.description: In combination with the used resource in the topic, the filter, together with the subResource, contains the readable reference to the DataSetWriterId and is identical to the filter in the topic (8.1.7).

SequenceNumber.description: A strictly monotonically increasing sequence number assigned to the DataSetMessage by the DataSetWriter

Status.description: Optional and may not be shown, when status is "Good"

Payload.description: This object contains the name-value pairs specified by the PublishedDataSet.

subResource.description: In combination with the used resource in the topic, the subResource, together with the filter, contains the readable reference to the DataSetWriterId and is identical to the subResource in the topic (8.1.6) if present.
